Johann Sebastian Bach: I was obliged to be industrious. Whoever is equally industrious will succeed equally well.
Jan Pieterszoon Sweelinck: What comprises our work is the intertwining of voice and instrument, creating harmonious unity through divine inspiration.
Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius.
